tutorial.speak:
Thank you for signing up for Chums and B1.church. I’d like to show you a couple things to get you started with the programs. When you log into Chums, you’ll be at the Chums dashboard.
In the top right-hand corner, click the icon and see the drop-down menu. This is where you can get your messages, notifications, change your profile, logout, and switch apps.
You can switch between Chums, B1, and Lessons.Church. All three apps use the same username and password.
Click on the B1 app and we’ll take a look at a couple things there.
In the B1 app, go to your name in the top right corner and choose the admin portal. This will allow you to edit the website, mobile app, and other programs in B1.
Click on the word "mobile app" in the top left-hand corner for the drop-down menu. This is where you’ll go to edit the programs within B1.
To find help, go to the ? in the top right-hand corner.
There you’ll find all of our tutorials, forum, and support email. I hope this gets you started with B1 and Chums. Feel free to reach out to us if you need any help. God bless.
